sentences.en: ...the sharp tinkle of metal impacting on stone.
sentences.cn: …金属撞击石头的刺耳叮当声。

sentences.en: Airbags inflate instantaneously on impact.
sentences.cn: 安全气囊遇到撞击立即膨胀。

sentences.en: Airbags protect the driver in the event of a severe frontal impact.
sentences.cn: 汽车若遇到正面猛烈撞击，安全气囊可以保护驾车者。

sentences.en: All colour fades— especially under the impact of direct sunlight.
sentences.cn: 所有颜色都会褪色——尤其是在阳光直射下。

sentences.en: His sharp retort clearly made an impact.
sentences.cn: 他尖刻的反驳显然起了作用。

sentences.en: MacMillan's music characteristically makes a dramatic impact.
sentences.cn: 麦克米伦的音乐一向给人很大的触动。

sentences.en: Our corre-spondent has been assessing the impact of the sanctions.
sentences.cn: 我们的记者一直在评估制裁带来的影响。

sentences.en: Such schemes mean little unless they impact people.
sentences.cn: 除非能对人们造成影响，否则这样的计划意义不大。

sentences.en: The durable high-impact plastic case is water resistant to 100 feet.
sentences.cn: 这种结实的高强度塑料盒子在水下100英尺以内是防水的。

sentences.en: the environmental impact of pollution
sentences.cn: 污染对环境的影响

sentences.en: The force of the impact knocked the breath out of her.
sentences.cn: 撞击力使她喘不过气来。

sentences.en: The impact of religion on voting has been analysed far too simplistically.
sentences.cn: 有关宗教对选举的影响的分析太过简单了。

sentences.en: The impact of these trends has varied regionally.
sentences.cn: 这些潮流的影响依区域而不同。

sentences.en: The major impact of this epidemic worldwide is yet to come.
sentences.cn: 这种传染病在世界范围内的重大影响还未完全显现。

sentences.en: The plane’s wing was damaged on impact.
sentences.cn: 飞机机翼因碰撞而受损。

sentences.en: The snowcoach concept in Yellowstone provides low-impact, low-pollution access.
sentences.cn: 在黄石公园里使用雪车这一想法，为人们提供了一种对环境低影响、低污染的游览方式。

sentences.en: The specific impact of the greenhouse effect is unknowable.
sentences.cn: 温室效应的具体影响无法知道。

sentences.en: The two wings of the aircraft broke off on impact.
sentences.cn: 飞机的两个机翼遭受撞击折断了。

sentences.en: They are unsentimental about their impact on employees.
sentences.cn: 他们理智看待自己给员工所带来的影响。

sentences.en: They say they expect the meeting to have a marked impact on the future of the country.
sentences.cn: 他们说期望这次会议对国家的未来产生显著的影响。

sentences.en: We need to assess the impact on climate change.
sentences.cn: 我们需要评估对气候变化的影响。

words.tran_cn: 压紧的；结实的；嵌入的；（人口）稠密的

phrases.tran_cn: 对于…有影响；对…造成冲击
视觉冲击，视觉震撼；视觉效果

trans.tran_en: the effect or influence that an event, situation etc has on someone or something
to have an important or noticeable effect on someone or something

trans.tran_cn: 冲撞； 挤满， 充满
trans.tran_en: If one object impacts on another, it hits it with great force
